meanings.definition: Not in accordance with accepted standards of behavior or propriety.
meanings.sent1: The clown's unseemlier behavior shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: It is unseemlier to talk loudly in a library.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's unseemlier attempt at flying made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unseemlier outfit at the formal event raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The unseemlier graffiti on the wall was quickly removed.

meanings.definition: Not fitting or appropriate in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: His unseemlier jokes during the meeting were not well-received.
meanings.sent2: Wearing flip-flops to a wedding is unseemlier.
meanings.sent3: The unseemlier choice of music at the funeral lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The unseemlier puzzle piece didn't fit into the picture.
meanings.sent5: The unseemlier behavior at the fancy restaurant was quickly addressed.
